APP.TITLE: Runner Toolkit
APP.DESCRIPTION: Professional running tools for race planning, performance tracking, and unit conversions.

RACE.TITLE: Race Tools
RACE.FINISH_TIME_PREDICTOR_DESC: Predict race finish times based on current performance
RACE.PACE_CALCULATOR_DESC: Calculate pace from distance and time

PERSONAL.TITLE: Personal Tools
PERSONAL.CALORIES_BURNED_CALCULATOR_DESC: Calculate calories burned during your runs
PERSONAL.BMI_CALCULATOR_DESC: Calculate your BMI and estimate body fat using advanced methods

UNITS.TITLE: Unit Converters
UNITS.PACE_SPEED_CONVERTER_DESC: Convert between pace and speed units

HOME.SUB_DESCRIPTION: Whether you're training for your first 5K or your next marathon, our calculators will help you
HOME.SUB_DESCRIPTION_2: run faster, train smarter, and reach your goals.
HOME.FAST_ACCURATE_DESC: Get instant, precise calculations for all your running metrics.
HOME.MOBILE_FRIENDLY_DESC: Works perfectly on all devices - phone, tablet, or desktop.
HOME.FREE_DESC: No subscriptions, no ads, no hidden costs - just pure functionality.
HOME.OFFLINE_DESC: No internet connection required - calculate anytime, anywhere.
HOME.CUSTOMIZABLE_DESC: Choose your preferred units and settings for a personalized experience.

CALORIES_BURNED_CALCULATOR.TITLE: Calories Burned Estimator
CALORIES_BURNED_CALCULATOR.DESCRIPTION: Estimate how many calories you burned based on your running distance, pace, and body weight.
CALORIES_BURNED_CALCULATOR.SUMMARY_SUB: Based on your distance, time and weight.

VO2MAX_CALCULATOR.TITLE: VO₂max Calculator
VO2MAX_CALCULATOR.DESCRIPTION: Enter your race distance and finish time to estimate your aerobic fitness.

FINISH_TIME_PREDICTOR.TITLE: Finish Time Predictor
FINISH_TIME_PREDICTOR.DESCRIPTION: Estimate your finish times for popular race distances based on a recent run.

PACE_CALCULATOR.TITLE: Pace Calculator
PACE_CALCULATOR.DESCRIPTION: Adjust time, distance, or pace to recalculate the others.

DISTANCE_UNIT_CONVERTER.TITLE: Distance Unit Convertsion
DISTANCE_UNIT_CONVERTER.DESCRIPTION: Quickly convert distances between miles and kilometers to plan your training or races.
DISTANCE_UNIT_CONVERTER.RESULT_SUBTITLE: Equivalent distances in kilometers and miles

PACE_SPEED_UNIT_CONVERTER.TITLE: Pace to Speed Conversion
PACE_SPEED_UNIT_CONVERTER.DESCRIPTION: Calculate equivalent speed and pace for your workouts.

WEIGHT_UNIT_CONVERTER.TITLE: Weight Unit Conversion
WEIGHT_UNIT_CONVERTER.DESCRIPTION: Quickly convert weights between kilograms and pounds.
WEIGHT_UNIT_CONVERTER.RESULT_SUBTITLE: Equivalent weights in kilograms and pounds

BMI_CALCULATOR.TITLE: Body Composition
BMI_CALCULATOR.DESCRIPTION: Calculate your BMI and estimate body fat using multiple methods for a more complete view of your body composition. Includes:
BMI_CALCULATOR.DESCRIPTION_2:
• Standard BMI
  • New BMI - height-adjusted BMI
  • IBW - ideal body weight
  • Body Fat % - estimated using Deurenberg formula
  • BMR - calories burned at rest
BMI_CALCULATOR.RESULT_SUBTITLE: Based on your height, weight, age and sex

CATEGORY.IBW_BAD: Your weight is far from ideal
